name: Clank
description: Clanks are sentient mechanical beings built from such materials as metal, wood, stone, and clay, to resemble humanoids, animals, or even inanimate objects.

features.name: Purposeful Design
features.description: Decide who you were created by and for what purpose. When you generate your Experience at character creation, choose one that reflects this purpose and add **+1** to it.

features.name: Efficient
features.description: When you take a short rest, you can substitute a long rest move for one of your short rest moves.

name: Ribbet
description: Those of ribbet ancestry resemble anthropomorphic frogs with protruding eyes and webbed hands and feet.

features.name: Long Tongue
features.description: You can use your long, powerful tongue to grab onto things close to you. You may also mark **Stress** to unleash it as a Finesse Close weapon that does **d12** physical damage using your Proficiency.

features.name: Amphibious
features.description: You can breathe and move underwater just as easily as on land.

name: Inferis
description: Those of the Daemon ancestry are the humanoid descendants of the Fallen Gods, who possess sharp canines, pointed ears, and horns that come in a variety of styles

features.name: Fearless
features.description: When you roll with **Fear**, you may choose to mark a **2 Stress** to make it a roll with **Hope** instead.

features.name: Dread Visage
features.description: You have advantage on rolls to intimidate a hostile target.

name: Dwarf
description: Dwarves are most easily recognized as short humanoids with square features, dense musculature, and thick hair.

features.name: Increased Fortitude
features.description: You can spend **3 Hope** to halve incoming physical damage.

features.name: Thick Skin
features.description: When taking minor damage, roll **1d6**. On a **5+**, you take no damage instead.

name: Giant
description: Giants are very tall humanoids with long arms, broad stature, and one to three eyes.

features.name: Endurance
features.description: Gain an additional Hit Point Slot at character creation.

features.name: Reach
features.description: Treat any weapon, feature, ability, or spell that has Melee range as though it has very close range instead.

name: Elf
description: Elves are typically tall humanoids with pointed ears and acutely attuned senses.

features.name: Quick Reaction
features.description: You can mark a **Stress** to take advantage on a Reaction Roll.

features.name: Celestial Trance
features.description: During a rest, you can drop into a trance and make an extra downtime move.

name: Human
description: Those of human ancestry are most easily recognized by their dextrous hands, rounded ears, and bodies built for endurance.

features.name: High Stamina
features.description: Take an additional **Stress** slot at character creation

features.name: Adaptability
features.description: When you fail a roll that utilized one of your Experience, you can mark a **Stress** to reroll. You must take the new result.

name: Orc
description: Orcs are most easily recognized as humanoids with square features and boar-like tusks.

features.name: Sturdy
features.description: When you have one hit point remaining, your armor score is doubled.

features.name: Tusks
features.description: After making a successful Melee attack, you can spend **Hope** to also gore the target with your tusks, adding **+1d6** to the damage roll.

name: Halfling
description: Halflings are typically smallet humanoids, with large hairy feet and prominent, rounded ears.

features.name: Youthful Spirit
features.description: At the beginning of each session, give everyone in your party a **Hope**.

features.name: Little Lucky
features.description: When you roll a **1** on your **Hope** die, you can reroll it, and must take the new result.

name: Drakona
description: Drakona resemble wingless dragons in humanoid form and possess a powerful elemental breath

features.name: Scales
features.description: Your natural scales act as protection, increasing your Armor Score by +1.

features.name: Elemental Breath
features.description: Choose an element for your breath (ice, fire, electricity, etc.). You can use this breath weapon against a target or group of targets within Very Close range, treating it as an Instinct weapon that deals **d8** magic damage using your Proficiency.

name: Katari
description: Those of katari ancestry are feline humanoids with soft fur and high, triangular ears.

features.name: Feline Instinct
features.description: When you make an Agility roll, you can mark a **Stress** to reroll your Hope Die. You must take the new result.

features.name: Retracting Claws
features.description: You can make an Agility roll to scratch a target in Melee range. On a success, they become Vulnerable.

name: Faerie
description: Those of faerie ancestry are winged humanoid creatures with insect-like features.

features.name: Wings
features.description: You can fly. While flying, mark a **Stress** before an adversaries attack roll to increase your Evasion by **+2** agains tthe attack.

features.name: Luckbender
features.description: Once per session, after you or an ally in Close range makes an **Action Roll**, you can spend **3 Hope** to reroll the Duality Dice. You must take the new result.

name: Faun
description: Those of faun ancestry resemble goats in humanoid form, with curving horns, square pupils, and cloven hooves.

features.name: Leap
features.description: You can easily leap up to Close range across gaps or chasms without making an Agility roll.

features.name: Kick
features.description: On a successful melee attack, you can mark a Stress to kick yourself off the target, adding 2d6 to the damage and pushing either them or yourself out of Melee range.

name: Galapa
description: Those of galapa ancestry resemble anthropomorphic turtles, with a large, domed shell into which the head and limbs can retract inside for defense.

features.name: Shell of Protection
features.description: Your shell provides a natural shield. Add your Proficiency to your Armor Score.

features.name: Slow and Steady
features.description: During combat, you can make an attack roll with advantage by placing an additional token on the action tracker.

name: Goblin
description: Those of goblin ancestry are small humanoids typically recognized by their large eyes and massive, membranous ears.

features.name: Danger Sense
features.description: Once per short rest, mark a **Stress** to make an adversary reroll an attack against you or an ally within Very Close range of you.

features.name: Surefooted
features.description: You ignore disadvantage on Agility rolls.

name: Fungril
description: Fungrils resemble a muchroom in humanoid form, bearing the features of the fungus from which they descend.

features.name: Fungril Network
features.description: You can make an **Instinct Roll (12)** to speak with others of your ancestry across any distance using your mycelial array.

features.name: Death Connection
features.description: While touching a corpse that died recently, you can mark a **Stress** to extract one memory related to a specific emotion or sensation.

name: Firbolg
description: Firbolgs resemble cows in a humanoid form, typically recognized by their broad noses and long ears.

features.name: Natural Calm
features.description: Whenever you should mark a **Stress**, roll a **d6**. On a **6**, don't mark it.

features.name: Charge
features.description: When you succeed on an Agility roll to move from Far or Very Far range into Melee with one or more targets, mark a **Stress** to deal **1d12** physical damage to all targets.

name: Simiah
description: Simiah resemble anthropomorphic monkeys and apes, with long legs and prehensile feet.

features.name: Nimble
features.description: Increase your Evasion by **+1** at character creation.

features.name: Natural Climber
features.description: You have advantage on Agility rolls that involve balancing and climbing.
